title: Olaf buff/flavor
body:
Rito?

Original question: Would Olaf be OVER POWERED if (E)Reckless Swing was a short ranged jump similar to Illaoi's (E)Harsh Lesson?

Edit: I clearly didnt fully analyze his kit before i posted this. It just kind of came to mind. 

As rangerofshadow pointed out having the gap closer and auto's reducing the E would be super overpowered. 

IF Olaf did get mobility out of his E, then reducing the affect auto's have on E is more than likely a necessary change. Any Olaf advocates VERY against these changes?

replies.body: That would be a very generous and scary change.
Is there any way to increase his base attack range like all the other juggernauts

Mmk just throwin out idea's. I dont play him and only seem him on rare occasion when one of the teams has adc and mage with no escapes/postioning.
@RangerofShadows: i did forget that his E cd is reduced by AA. if the cd only reduced by .5 seconds from autos or if the cd was reduced and the AA function was removed do you think the leap could be implemented? I think aesthetically based on his art work it just seems so fitting!
It would be less op however I feel as though it would be overbearing to have both a ranged high dmg spammy slow, be uncc able+ movespeed and have a gap closer.
He also just got indirectly buffed pretty big by ghost change.

I still havent seen him picked since the changes BUT you're right, the ghost buff is a HUGE buff to Olaf. It just seems lame to have to base a champion around a summoner ability. It'd be like if gnar had no way to get into the fight to use hit ult and he had to flash every time.

It just hasn't happened yet mark my words he will be used in LCS and very strong.
A short cd ability reduced by autoing that is also a gap closer that lets you keep autoing
Replied to you in Sotere's comment
If they wanted to make him a pick just remove the reduction of armor and mr off his R when he activates it. Maybe then late game someone can fckin kill maokai.
Yes that would break him lol
